mapper.sql: from sys_menu m join sys_role_menu rm on rm.mid = m.id join sys_role r on r.id = rm.rid join sys_user_role ur on ur.rid = r.id join sys_user u on u.id = ur.uid
mapper.select: select m.per_code from sys_menu m join sys_role_menu rm on rm.mid = m.id join sys_role r on r.id = rm.rid join sys_user_role ur on ur.rid = r.id join sys_user u on u.id = ur.uid where u.id = #{id} and m.delete_flag = 0
select m.id ,m.pid ,m.title, m.url from sys_menu m join sys_role_menu rm on rm.mid = m.id join sys_role r on r.id = rm.rid where r.id = #{id} and m.delete_flag = 0

select m.id ,m.pid ,m.title, `url` from sys_menu m join sys_role_menu rm on rm.mid = m.id join sys_role r on r.id = rm.rid join sys_user_role ur on ur.rid = r.id join sys_user u on u.id = ur.uid
u.id = #{id} and m.delete_flag = 0
select r.* from sys_role r join sys_user_role ur on ur.rid = r.id where ur.uid = #{id}
